Name: La Vi√±a
Review Text: Came here for a work event and it was just okay.  The salmon was watery, the salad was okay and the dessert was nothing special.  The wine pairing was just okay as well.

Name: La Vi√±a

I got a wine arrangement --3 delicious glasses for ‚Ç¨15. Lovely outdoor seating area in a bustling neighborhood (on a Saturday evening).

Name: La Vi√±a

Name: La Vi√±a
Review Text: Very small side dishes. Lamb was good, steak average at best, fish not fresh, but replaced. Service could be friendlier, bit gruff. Nice outside, great neighborhood.

Name: La Vi√±a
Review Text: We had a wonderful meal there.  Sidewalk table. I had the chef's special: ribs and my wife had the excellent Ravioli. It was topped off with a superb Italian wine. Don't miss this lovely place.

Name: La Vi√±a
Review Text: Great place for a wine and a bite. The waitress recommended a nice red wine (letours) that matched really nicely with the spinach artichoke dip. Very tasty. Nice atmosphere too.

Name: La Vi√±a
Review Text: Small restaurant with reasonable prices and good portions. The steak and cheesecake were incredible. Had a lot of gluten free options too.

Name: La Vi√±a
Review Text: Out of this world. Off the beaten (tourist) path neighborhood restaurant. Whole menu was gluten free except for the ravioli. Iberico cheeks and chocolate fondant are a MUST. Very aware of celiac and avoid all cross contamination.
